嵺字的基本解释

嵺
liáo
〔嵺廓〕同“寥廓”，深远空旷。

嵺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《集韻》憐蕭切，平蕭，來。］
(1)见“嵺廓”。
(2)见“嵺嵺”。
(3)见“嵺廓”。
(4)见“嵺嵺”。
[②]［liù］
亦作“1”。
亦作“”。见“嵺2愀”。

嵺字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵺； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页318第03
【廣韻】落蕭切【集韻】【韻會】憐蕭切【正韻】連條切，?音聊。山聳貌。　又廣遠也。【杜甫·朝享太廟賦】元甲?嵺以岳峙。　一作嶚嶛。或作?。

嵺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嵺字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Um
liáo
[Ankuo] Same as "Liakuo", far-reaching and empty.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáo］
["Ji Yun" Ping Xiaoqie, Ping Xiao, come. ]
(1) See "Anguo".
(2) See "An'an".
(3) See "Anguo".
(4) See "An'an".
[②]［liù］
Also known as "1".
Also known as "". See "嵺2愀".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵺; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 318 03
[Guang Yun] Luo Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pity Xiaoqie [Zheng Yun] Cut one after another, and talk to each other. The mountain looks so high.　It's also far-reaching. [Du Fu·Chaoxiang Taimiao Fu] Yuan Jia? An Yi Yuezhi.　一作嶚嶛. Or for?.
